welcome: Welcome to the site about the cities of Russia
greeting: I am pleased to welcome you to a world where majestic mountains meet endless plains, where each city has its own unique traditions and history. Here you can learn more about a great country that brings together an amazing variety of cultures, natural wealth, and incredible people.
explore: Let your journey through the pages of my site open new horizons for you and give you the opportunity to see Russia from the most unexpected sides.
exploreEmphasized: Explore, be inspired, and discover all the facets of this great country.
